name: 薛文景
objective:
1.本課程在討論生醫陶瓷性質與應用在整形外科和牙醫界。課程內容包括骨科材料之發展,牙醫材料之應用,陶瓷在生醫工程之應用及生醫複合材料材料之工程問題。
2.Also, fundamental study of designing bioactive ceramics to conductive the repair of osteoporotic bone and to enhance the quality of bone bonded to the implant.
schedule:
1.Composition of bio-ceramics
2.Composition and mechanical properties in clinic
3.Density, hardness compressive, bending stress, modulus, and toughness
4-6.Form, phase, and function of bioactive ceramics
In forms of power, coating, and bulk　　　　1
7-9.Bio-bone bonded interface
10. Midterm reports
11.-12.Midterm reports/Bio-glass-bonding gel-layer, and cortical bone/cancellous bone
Composition of HA vs Bio-bone
13.Dehiscence rate
14.Load bearing implants A/W glass(Cerabone)
15.Vertebral replacement Bioactive cement
期末考試/　　 (open books exam)
